Core:PCProperties.Core:Property:
(\{ "members", "\The Midas Company was formed by Salvatore Costello and Charisma Pulcher on March 13, 1600 for the expansion and maximization of profit, influence, and trade throughout the known world!\\
\
\\r\\n\\r\\nTrade:\
\\r\\n- Exotic Imports\
\\r\\n- Specialty Products\
\\r\\n- Loans and Investments\
\
\\r\\n\\r\\nSecurity:\
\\r\\n- Hunting Expeditions\
\\r\\n- Protection for Hire\
\
\\r\\n\\r\\nGuild Rules:\
\\r\\n- Buy low, sell high\
\\r\\n- Keep our secrets secret", (\{ "page", "Main Page", "default" \}) \})

(\{ "visitors", "Services:\
\\r\\n- Trading Valuables\
\\r\\n- Exotic Import Requests\
\\r\\n- Fishing Expeditions\
\\r\\n- Legal Services\
\\r\\n- Loans\
", (\{ "page", "Main Page", "default" \}) \})

(\{ "members", "Template:\
\
\\r\\nI, NAME, hereby enter into the following loan agreement with SALVATORE COSTELLO, based on the following terms:\
\
\\r\\nX FLORINS PRINCIPAL\
\\r\\nY% INTEREST RATE (150 FLORINS)\
\\r\\nZ MONTHS TERM (DUE DATE)\
\
\\r\\nIf the terms of this agreement are not satisfied upon the specified date, then one or more of the following collection methods shall occur in the following order:\
\\r\\n- Extension through lender (with interest penalty)\
\\r\\n- Settlement through goods or services\
\\r\\n- Indentured servitude\
\\r\\n- Imprisonment\
\
\\r\\nIf you accept this loan, then both lender and borrower will sign a copy and borrower will submit full repayment in the form of a promissory note as collateral. The promissory note will not be cashed until the end of the loan term, unless there is agreement between both parties to do so earlier.\
\
\\r\\n--\
\
\\r\\n\\r\\nEVE\
\\r\\n1000 with 15% interest\
\\r\\n1150 due mid-June\
\\r\\nCOMPLETED\
\
\\r\\n\\r\\nKHASHAB\
\\r\\n1000 with 20% interest\
\\r\\n1200 due mid-June\
\\r\\nCOMPLETED\
\\r\\n\
\\r\\n\\r\\nDURIN\
\\r\\n1000 with 20% interest\
\\r\\n1200 due mid-July\
\\r\\nCOMPLETED\
\\r\\n--\
" \})
